publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-929 Donald Gorrie: Support for Local Sports Clubs and Activities-That the Parliament urges sportscotland, the Scottish Executive and local authorities to work together to develop a decentralised structure that will support and encourage the development of the approximately 13,000 sports clubs, especially in promoting more sport for young people and the sporting activities of other organisations, using the existing network of local sports councils. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-929 Support for Local Sports Clubs and Activities (lodged on 23 February 2004) Mark Ballard*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-929 Support for Local Sports Clubs and Activities (lodged on 23 February 2004) Robert Brown*

S2M-929 Donald Gorrie: Support for Local Sports Clubs and Activities-That the Parliament urges sportscotland, the Scottish Executive and local authorities to work together to develop a decentralised structure that will support and encourage the development of the approximately 13,000 sports clubs, especially in promoting more sport for young people and the sporting activities of other organisations, using the existing network of local sports councils. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Rosie Kane, Mark Ballard, Christine Grahame, Robert Brown
S2M-929 Support for Local Sports Clubs and Activities (lodged on 23 February 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-929 Support for Local Sports Clubs and Activities (lodged on 23 February 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-929 Support for Local Sports Clubs and Activities (lodged on 23 February 2004) Elaine Smith*
